thread.title: BREAKING NEWS: Start of WW3? US imposes new sanctions on nuclear power Iran
thread.title_full: BREAKING NEWS: Start of WW3? US imposes new sanctions on nuclear power Iran

title: BREAKING NEWS: Start of WW3? US imposes new sanctions on nuclear power Iran
text:
BREAKING NEWS: Start of WW3? US imposes new sanctions on nuclear power Iran BREAKING NEWS: Start of WW3? US imposes new sanctions on nuclear power Iran THE United States has imposed sanctions on Iran just days after Tehran tested a ballistic missile. PUBLISHED: 15:26, Fri, Feb 3, 2017 | UPDATED: 15:32, Fri, Feb 3, 2017 EPA/ AFP The US has imposed sanctions on Iran over its missile test 
The US sanctioned 13 individuals and 12 entities under US Iran sanctions authority, days after the White House had put Iran "on notice" over a ballistic missile test and other activities. 
In a statement on its website, the US Treasury listed the sanctioned individuals and entities, some of which are based in the United Arab Emirates, Lebanon and China. 
Earlier today President Donald Trump warned: “Iran is playing with fire - they don't appreciate how "kind" President Obama was to them. Not me!” 
More to follow...
